description: The dual-SIM device Samsung Galaxy S20 runs on Android 10 (One UI), and sports a 6.2 inches, 93.8 cm2 (~89.5% screen-to-body ratio), 1440 x 3200 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~563 ppi density), Dynamic AMOLED 2X capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors with a 20:9 aspect ratio. The device is powered by Exynos 990 – Global or Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 – the USA, Octa-core processor, coupled with 8 GB of RAM and 128 GB of inbuilt storage which is expandable up to microSDXC (uses shared SIM slot) card. The Galaxy S20 features a triple-camera setup at the rear, comprised of a 12-megapixel main sensor with an f/1.9 aperture, a 64-megapixel secondary sensor with an f/2.2 aperture and also comes with the Dual video call feature. The second 12 MP camera enables 120-degree ultra-wide-angle photography and can be selected through the camera app on the smartphone. Just fire up the 10 MP Front Camera for lit selfies on your social feed with the In-Display Flash, selfie focus mode and f/2.0 aperture. The amazing S20 is available in two different colors Cosmic Grey, Cloud Blue, Cloud Pink colors. This device is unstoppable with 4000 mAh battery under the hood and has a Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, and barometer alongside the Fast Face Unlock feature to unlock your phone quickly.

Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Pro Price in Bangladesh, Release date

The Redmi Note 9 Pro smartphone was available. Now, Redmi Note 9 Pro basic variant (4GB/64GB) is the official price available at BDT. about 25,999 in Bangladesh. The style phone is available in Bangladesh with Tropical Green, Glacier White, Interstellar Gray colors variant.
